# timePerFrame

**Instance Property**

The duration, in seconds, that each texture in the textures array is displayed before switching to the next texture in the sequence.

## Declaration

```swift
var timePerFrame: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Configure Animated Tile Properties

- **textures**: An array of [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKTexture] objects that defines the tile definition object’s content.
- **normalTextures**: An array of [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKTexture] objects used to generate the normals for the tile to simulate 3D lighting.
